publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2481.2 Margaret Curran: Obesity Action Plan—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2481) in the name of Shona Robison, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward to the Parliament details on how it intends to meet its commitment to two hours per week PE tuition in schools by specialist teachers and guarantee five days’ outdoor education for every school pupil."
